summary: A wealthy male banishes a demon, but years later his very own daughter resurrects it.
cast: Hashmat Khan|Manjeet Kular|Kunickaa Sadanand|Satish Kaul|Anita Sareen|Anirudh Agarwal|Aruna Irani|Raza Murad|Vijayendra Ghatge|Karunakar Pathak|Surinder Kohli|Jack Gaud|Shyamalee|Beena Banerjee|Johnny Lever|Ashalata Wabgaonkar|Sunil Dhawan|Rajni Bala
title: Bandh Darwaza
